climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: {ORTHOPEDIC LEG PILLOW HELP REDUCE DISCOMFORT} Are you always uncomfortable at night for sleep with back and hip pain? The Omloon Knee Pillow is the perfect choice for those looking for pain relief as the cushion comfortably supports your legs & knees to provide proper sleeping alignment & positioning to eliminate those painful pressure points. Very suitable for all posture sleepers(side, back & stomach). The innovative ergonomic support design help you to improve sleeping quality.

{VENTILATED ERGONOMIC MEMORY KNEE PILLOW} Do you often toss and turn because you can't find the the right knee & leg pillow that suits you?? Featured with the size of 10.63×8.5×5.5/3inches, our ergonomic pillow is perfect for all positions of sleepers. Unique tiny butterfly shape design, add middle airflow hollow hole design, give your legs or knee proper support and cooling whole night sleep. Try them out and experience the ultimate in comfort and support.

{SKIN-FRIENDLY PILLOWCASE & ELASTIC STRAP} Sleep comfortably all night long. Each Omloon Knee Pillow comes with an easily removable & washable pillow cover, skin-friendly & breathable for your good sleep. Our hip pillow for side sleepers also comes with a high-quality zipper that won’t break or wear down in the wash. Unlike other knee and hip pillows, our pillow comes with an elastic strap to keep the pillow stay in place when you sleep or rest.

{SLOW REBOUND SAFE MATERIAL} The premium quality memory foam is firm and not too soft for maximum comfort and great relaxation of your hips, joint, back, legs, knees and ankle. In addition, you can take it as a car pillow to relax you neck. The leg pillow will rebound within 3-5 seconds when no press, non-deformation all the year. Please NOTE that the memory foam pillow core CANNOT be washed!

{HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE}Omloon knee pillow provides good solution fit men & women comfortably sleep. Memory foam will have a very slight smell after passing through a high temperature and airtight transportation environment. This is a normal phenomenon. After receiving it, please place it in a cool and ventilated place for 3-5 days. If for any reason you're not satisfied with the orthopedic pillow, please feel free to contact us. We offer 24-month product worry-free and friendly customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillow to separate knees for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Others have described this pillow as too small but it is perfect for me. I am using it to separate my knees while I sleep. I am a side sleeper with my knees bent. The bones on the sides of my knees are sharp and hurt when my legs are aligned one on top of the other. This pillow allows there to be separation and no more pain of pointy bones poking each other. The elastic strap keeps the pillow in place without being too tight. I don't even notice the strap at all. The cover comes completely off for washing since the zipper goes all the way around. The cover also seems much more durable than many of the other leg pillow covers I saw. The cover is slippery so it won't get resistances while turning over. The first night I didn't use the strap and at some point in the night the pillow escaped to the floor so I have used the strap ever since. I toss and turn when I sleep but somehow the pillow stays in place when I flip from one side to the other. The pillow is very comfortable with just the right amount of firmness to keep my knees apart. I only wish I hadn't waited so long to get this pillow. If it helps, I am 5 foot 3 inches and 122 lbs and the curve of the pillow cradles my lower thigh perfectly. If you are looking for a leg pillow to separate your knees and keep your hip and legs properly aligned while you sleep on your side, you need this pillow. I sometimes flip to my back for a bit before turning to the other side and the pillow stays comfortably in place. I hope this helps, I had so many different pillows in my cart for over a week before selecting this particular pillow and I am very happy I chose this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with Pain and Support
reviews.reviewText: This pillow actually offers a decent amount of support for the shape that it is. I was a little hesitant about it, but I really like it. The comfort level is great with the strap fitting snug, but not overly tight. The fabric is soft and not scratchy at all, which is great for those, like me, with sensitive skin. I will say that if I lay in one position too long, whichever leg is on top of the pillow will start to ache. However, that I think is more just a "me" issue versus a pillow issue. I have lower back and hip issues and this is my first time using something like this, so it really be my body adjusting to a knee pillow. I do recommend this product for it's comfort. It does sink down as it is made out of a soft memory foam, but bounces back quickly after every use. It hasn't gone flat or lost any of it's dimension. The way it dips in the middle does provide a certain amount of stability for your leg as it rests there. Overall, I have noticed a difference in my quality of sleep and in my pain level while I sleep and when I get up. Like I said, the only issue is if I lay on one side too long. I would definitely recommend for anybody with narrower hips that are looking to stabilize them while you sleep. It works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked better than expected
reviews.reviewText: first I thought the strap would be an issue because it was not very snug but I realized this was a benefit because I didn't feel any pressure from it during the night. I also found that it stayed jn position well even when turning. As far as comfort, I think it was very comfortable overall and did not seem to over heat the area. I like the fact it can be opened and washed and the zipper is nearly invisible so it will never be felt. For me the optimal position was just above the knee and it conformed well there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very small, pretty good
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a side sleeper with hip pain. I've been using a normal bed pillow but was tired of it taking up so much room under the covers, and wanted something smaller. This is small...very small. As a larger male, it might end up being too small for me. It does have the strap to keep it in place but I'm not such a fan of it. But it seems well made, the material is soft and comfortable, and I like the shape of it. The memory foam is firm but not the firmest. It would be a good fit for anyone who wants a smaller leg pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute must for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I love this pillow. Everything about the design is wonderful and the leg strap is perfect to keep it in place while being very comfortable and not noticeable while wearing it. The pillow is a great size and eliminated 90% of my back pain from side sleeping literally overnight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t know how I survived without this!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is fantastic! I love the strap, it helps to keep the pillow in place while I am relaxing or sleeping. I have a chronic pain issue and have a lot of trouble sleeping. I have exactly slept better since I got my pillow. It’s soft and the memory foam is great. It springs right back into shape after use. The pillow helps to align my hips and knees which is where most of my pain is. It helps to alleviate some of the pain and allows me to fall asleep. I am so grateful for that. This is an amazing product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately, not loving it
reviews.reviewText: Although I will say it helped keep my body better aligned the downside was the pillow for me was way too firm to be comfortable for very long. I'm either pushing it away or forcing myself to use it which just causes me sleep issues.Pillow as also much smaller than I thought it would be. I was thinking it would be a bit bigger and wider. I think that might have helped a little bit if it was, because trying to keep the pillow balanced between my legs has been difficult. I know, it has a strap, but I cannot tolerate the strap either. If I didn't feel the strap clenching around my leg, it would be fine, but I feel it way too much when it's around my leg.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Comfy, and Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this awesome knee pillow for travel and it's perfect! The strap keeps it in place and super comfortable. I immediately feel the support. Plus, this will be easy to tuck into a suitcase. Win-win! Thanks Omloon!
